body.p:
Hartford May 7th 1865
Hon. Thomas E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky.

I have written to you sevaral times, but I have not received any answer yet. I was find in the Ohio Circuit Court in March 1862 the Amount iof Ninety five Dollars for selling Liquor, I have send a Petition to you with about One hundred Names, about a Year or more ago, I have paid all except what Comes to the Staate to work If I would be healthy and able to work I would not ask You to Remitt it, but I am allways sickly

I Remain Respectfullly Yours
M. Baer
